dmca.title: Iron Chef on the hotplate
dmca.body:
This firm represents Fuji Television Network, Inc. ("Fuji"), owner of the trademarks and copyrights on "Iron Chef," a program aired in the United States on the Television Food Network. We are directing this letter to you because we are unaware that you have engaged legal counsel with respect to this matter. We understand that you are the creator of and the contact for the Ironchef.com website.

It has come to our attention that Ironchef.com is currently infringing our client
